Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premier product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations and bring substantial value to your company. Given its unique features and capabilities, this product is worth more than just its monetary value. I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000, aiming to provide you with an exceptional opportunity to leverage its benefits without a heavy financial burden. I trust that you will find this proposal compelling and look forward to discussing how it can contribute to your strategic goals. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am here to assist you every step of the way. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $950,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,000,000
